candidate.summary: Data Scientist with 5+ years of experience in machine learning, data analytics, and big data processing. Passionate about developing AI-driven solutions that optimize business processes and decision-making.

responsibilities: Developed and deployed machine learning models for customer segmentation, increasing retention by 15%
Built scalable data pipelines using Apache Spark and AWS, reducing ETL processing time by 40%
Led a team of 5 data scientists and collaborated with cross-functional teams to drive data-driven decision-making
Designed NLP models for sentiment analysis, improving accuracy from 78% to 92%
Optimized recommendation systems using collaborative filtering, increasing user engagement by 20%
Automated data processing tasks with Python, reducing manual work by 30 hours per month
